Reviews.Author: 413sport
Reviews.Content: It's a good, basic laptop that is thin and light but has a numeric keypad which makes it good for entering financial data. Has good memory and is reasonably fast. So far I have been very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Nice machine
Reviews.Author: T Watkins
Reviews.Content: I love the style of the computer, its smart, runs well  but the only problem I have is Windows 8 - I wish they would have sent a manual on how to use the thing. However with a bit of searching I did find a good book on how to use windows 8  Using Windows 8 (Computer Training)

Reviews.Title: Had issues with the screen
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my nephew to use at school.  Within the first week, I had issues with the screen.  It would splits into two vertical images.  I could not shut the system down with Windows 8 because I could not get the mouse to move to the upper right corner of the screen.  I had to use an external monitor to see the cursor.  I called DELL Tech Service.  They sent a technician to replaced the screen.  This is not a good sign for a new laptop.

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: karyne
Reviews.Content: It is the perfect choice for me when my computer goes out and I have to WIFI at McDonalds Amen!

Reviews.Title: Dell Laptop
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I love it!!! The windows 8 takes some getting use to but not horrible. Everything else is great. definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15 i15RV-6190BLK 15.6-Inch Laptop (Black Matte with Textured...
Reviews.Author: Gary W. Herbert "The other half"
Reviews.Content: Used the 24 hour delivery as my computer hard drive failed... It is a good computer for general use, it is not a gamer device... The only thing I hate is it has Win 8... Not my choice in OS but the price was great and next day delivery was also... Found no other vendor that came close to price...

Reviews.Title: Slim and Light
Reviews.Author: nogozo
Reviews.Content: The item is thin than later Inspiron model.Considering affordable laptop, yet it do the job for you.Primarily the unit is intended for web-chat and the like. It does not end there, you can do different jobs multitask.I used a Inspiron 14 previously, and the LCD monitor breakdown after a year, sad to say it cannot be replace because the warranty ends already.Quality and build of this model is good enough hoping it will last 5 years on my estimate with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Gourgel Neto
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this PC for my uncle and he likes it. It comes with Windows 8 that i easily activated through the phone. I would recommend it to everyone. It shipped timely.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: jc
Reviews.Content: For the money this is a good laptop. I use it for bill paying and internet surfing and it works fine.

Reviews.Title: love dell
Reviews.Author: Rodney Accime
Reviews.Content: Before having this laptop. I had a toshiba laptop. The old laptop was not running as fast anymore. I always wanted a dell and the price for it was a steal. The only thing I don't like is Windows 8. It is so much different than windows 7. The biggest difference is the start menu or start screen as used on the windows 8. I still would like to have a start menu. Other than that this is a really great laptop.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: ERIC ROBSON
Reviews.Content: GREAT SPEED AND LIGHT. GREAT DEAL FOR THE MONEY. I RECOMMENDED THIS TO MY IN-LAWS AND THEY WERE AMAZED. BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Great computer for the price!
Reviews.Author: Chris Brewer
Reviews.Content: I needed a laptop quick.I cracked the screen on my old Dell and it just was not worth fixing right now. This one had an incredible price($299 at the time). I wanted windows 7 but the options were limited and more expensive. I decided to go with a screaming deal on a windows 8 laptop. I have not been disappointed with this one. The Pentium processor is dual core and ranks close to the i3.It also uses very little power and runs very cool. Windows 8 sucks just like everyone says. I installed classic shell(this bypasses that awful start screen and gives you a start button) and now it is just fine. It is not super fast, but does normal web browsing and computing needs very well. The main reasons for not giving it 5 stars are as follows: 1. Keyboard and track pad are sub par. The keys have to be pushed very hard. I always use a cordless mouse but can say that the track pad is not great. 2.The finish does get a greasy look to it very quickly. I had read this in a few reviews and ignored it.This really does happen.I thought a finish like this would do just the opposite. I was wrong. Finally the fan ran constantly until the bios was updated from ao4 to ao6.  Overall this computer works great for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Second attempt got it right.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Sheffield
Reviews.Content: I ordered this laptop for my son, as a birthday gift. The product arrived a few days prior to the event, but obviously, we didn't open it until his big day. Unfortunately, the computer was running on Ubuntu, not Windows. This was problematic, particularly because the laptop was specifically marketed, both on Amazon and on the box, as running Windows software. We returned it and received the correct product, which runs correctly, but we didn't have it on his birthday, and that would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: I have two negatives...I hate Windows 8! and I thought that I would have the Windows Office already installed but it doesn't come with it and you have to purchase it! :(

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron Computer
Reviews.Author: Rosemary
Reviews.Content: Nothing I do not like about the computer, but Windows 8 is a little hard to get used to. I just do not have the time to set and play with it right now, but it's getting easier each time I use it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: albert paez
Reviews.Content: is much better than I expected from this product, I recommend it with eyes closed, dont really is an excellent deal

Reviews.Title: Purchased 4-25-13 Hard Drive Failed 5-29-13
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: I just got off the phone with tech support and my hard drive has failed already. I guess you get what you pay for. Luckily it is a Dell and they have decent support. If they do what they said they would do, I should get a call in a few days to have a tech support person come to my home to fix it.Besides that the laptop was ok, but felt flimsy and the edges were sharp against my wrists while typing.Hate Windows 8! If it has failed inside the 1 month I would have just returned it and bought something else.

Reviews.Title: Disapointed ..
Reviews.Author: Rebecca E. Kempton
Reviews.Content: I personally wanted to give this a 2 star... but then I had to consider the price and gave it a 3 star.The volume f11 and f12 do not work.The nearly four inch wrist rest is to deep, its very uncomfortable to type when sitting at the table with this laptop ( the edges are actually sharp).It has a overall "cheap" feeling ...I guess because it is inexpensive  ( I keep trying to remember that fact).I do like the size of the touch pad, but the buttons don't feel like they will last.I am not a fan of the low profile keyboard either ( however all newer computers seem to have them now).It did boot up fine ... and the computer itself seems to be working well ( this is my 3 Dell, so I'm a repeat customer)  but the case/ or shell appears substandard.So if this is back up ...or if you are using it with a TV, I'm sure its a great buy ....if its for everyday use, this may not be the one. ( I'll update this review in a month or so ...after I have used it for a while). I am trying to tell myself I will get used to windows 8 ....so far I don't believe myself.*************** I want to update my review ,  I have decided to return this laptop.  With the 2 function keys not working and and the right button on on the mouse pad sticking ....  I decided that it had to much against it , for a BRAND new computer. ( even a inexpensive one).I was unsure about my ability to return the defective laptop , because it was not actually "dead on arrival"  and I had used it for several days ...  I sent a detailed message to Amazon , and in less than 24 HR I was sent a return label.I have always been 100% pleased with AMAZON and with this situation they rose to the occasion.  I am slightly concerned , because the "reason" for the return on the label says "different from what was ordered"  and that is not the case ... other than I ordered a laptop that should not be defective.  I am hopeful that the return process goes well ... and I look forward to buying a new laptop as soon as my credit it processed .

Reviews.Title: Stay Away
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: I have had this product for about few months and it is absolutely awful. If I could give it a half star, I would. It started how running pretty smooth and with plenty of speed. Although I have virtually downloaded nothing on it - mainly just using it for online browsing & word documents - it has a problem every single day. It regularly locks up where your only solution is to turn it off. Most of the time I cannot even get the task manager to pull up and close out the browser/programs because only a black screen will be displayed or the mouse will not click on anything.If I had to do it over, I would have just bit the bullet and gone with an Apple or put some more money into a better laptop. It is almost worthless after just a few months of minimal use.

Reviews.Title: Virtually unusable
Reviews.Author: The Old Philosopher "The Old Philosopher"
Reviews.Content: Its not all Dell's fault.  The biggest problem is the Windows 8 operating system that is the biggest corporate F up since "New Coke."  I fail to understand how any sane person at MS would think this was suitable for computer users, and I fail to understand how any sane person at Dell would think that Windows 8 should have been installed on a laptop like this one.  Windows 8 is a poorly done imitation of I-phone, not a PC/laptop operating system.  It makes the whole product into a pile of junk.The other problem, which is Dell's design problem, is the touch pad location right in front of the keyboard.  When using the keyboard my palms, or shirt sleeves invariable touch the pad, and the rest of my typing leaps somewhere else at random.  I end up having to delete and re-enter even a simple user name 3 or 4 times.  Back when, keyboards had palm rests to help locate your hands and fingers.  Switching location of the keyboard and touch pad on this laptop would help a lot.  Or, deactivate the touchpad when someone plugs in a USB mouse.Somehow the size of type I'm using keeps changing randomly too.  Is it Dell's F up, or MS's?Other than being a worthless pile of junk, its pretty well built and easy to carry around.  Come on Dell, send MS a huge complaint and demand free Windows 7 or even VISTA.  Actually Windows 7 was the first step DOWN.  8 just finished the job.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia P.
Reviews.Content: I've only had this laptop one day but I really like it.  I would say it's a really good computer at it's price point.  The case doesn't have a latch but all else seems to be good.  The camera has good resolution and a good processing speed and the volume is much better than my previous laptop by a different mfg.  Also, it's much lighter than I expected.It came with Windows 8 and I love it.  Before yesterday I'd never even seen Windows 8 but heard really negative things about it.  I'm no expert but I consider myself fairly knowledgable about computers and operating systems and I love 8.  If you are apprehensive about upgrading to 8 I recommend giving it a try.  Don't get me wrong it will take some getting used to and doing a short tutorial or two might be a good idea but definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Laptop!!
Reviews.Author: jess
Reviews.Content: **** I just bought this same laptop at Best Buy for $279!! ****Ok now that I got the price difference at Best Buy out of the way I LOVE this laptop!! It's great and you can't beat the price ( at Best Buy anyway!)I didn't love Windows 8 right away but I'm comfortable with it in less than 24 hours. It's pretty easy to figure out and you can easily switch back to the desktop you're used to.Set up is incredibly simple. It prompts you all the way so there is no guessing. It found my wifi signal and I didn't even need to connect it to the modem, or spend any time digging out the cord I haven't used in years! It also found my printer without connecting it or putting in the disk. I just got the laptop close to the printer and the prompts popped right up.I'm not completely tech incapable but I'm no tech genius either so this was great for me.I'm not a gamer so I cant say if this laptop would work for that. However, if you just want to do the basics like surf the web, check email, type word docs, etc this is a fantastic laptop.It powers up really fast, much MUCH faster than my old laptop. Customization is simple and fun.The screen is huge and the laptop itself is thin. I like that you can add your favorite apps to the start screen. I already have Pinterest, Amazon and eBay up there!The only things I'm not 100% thrilled with are there is no scroll feature on the touch pad, there is no light on the power button and the keyboard is not backlit. All in all those are small things and considering after taxes this cost me under $300 I'm incredibly happy with my purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing for the price it has. Great for everyday use. Personal, College, and entertainment! definitely economical! I just hope I can use it for at least 4 years!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Micah
Reviews.Content: I ordered this not having used windows 8 so I wasn't sure what to expect. After having for over a month I'm in love it does everything I need for work and play I'm so happy with it and for the price you can't beat it. After seeing the laptop a coworker ordered the same one...

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: excellent device excellent delivery service is just great device met all my expectations dei running OS is great, the aesthetic of the team I love is very light and thin which makes it very easy to carry and have everything I need to work

Reviews.Title: DELL INSPIRON i15RV
Reviews.Author: William D. Hayden "d1hayden"
Reviews.Content: I think it is great. Works fine! Everything as listed. Will be getting a bigger hard drive when I get the money. I am amazed how it works and the speed. This is my first time with Microsoft Windows 7, I am a VISTA 64 bit snob but I am learning quickly. Dell is always GREAT. This is my 3rd Dell laptop. My previous two were 8 and 11 years ago when it wasn't as fancy, quick, thin, awesome color, great graphics. I had a problem with my second laptop and dell tried to fix it and couldn't so they sent a technician to my house and changed everything except the screen and I was shocked when you get their best warranty package it reall pays off!! AWESOME!!! I wouldn't hesitate to get another Dell Laptop. I want to get a 17" but buy the time I get the money they will probably be 34" and have everything totally updated!! I would give this laptop 9 & 7/8 out of ten. If the standard sound sounded better, but you can always buy GREAT speakers if music is you thing! For the PRICE THIS DELL IS ABSOLUTLY THE BEST!!

Reviews.Title: wisly
Reviews.Author: Wisly PROSPERE
Reviews.Content: I loveit because it's sexy and in excellent condition. It's why I give it a excellent feed back. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: For the Price- I like
Reviews.Author: Heather Leigh
Reviews.Content: Love the big screen- Perfect for streaming tv and movies, which is what I use it for. Hate windows 8- wish it has 7. Tok me forever to figure out how to navigate. Seems to bog down, but pretty good other than that.

Reviews.Title: STAY AWAY FROM DELL!!! Hard Drive crashed within 5 months!! No option to return or exchange! Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: Paul Bryant
Reviews.Content: Above says it all. Bought late Nov 2013, hard-drive crashed in April 2014 after very little use (2x per week usage on average), crash not virus-related either. Purely poor quality of components used. Figured I had a 1-yr warranty which is usual and customary. They posted no information regarding warranty---nice job Dell with the exclusion! I find out now my window to return expired in Jan 2014!!! Less than 60 days??? Dell must know this was going to happen. Now I have a POS that's not worth anything. NEVER BUYING Dell AGAIN! No wonder their company stock price has tanked over the years. Definitely not the same company. Terrible quality and zero customer service!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Laptop
Reviews.Author: Amazongirl
Reviews.Content: Everything, I expected and more... This computer was fully loaded... Word and Every programs needed to keep this machine in running order was already installed. I recommend this machine to anyone...

Reviews.Title: WOW, perfect!
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I love it ! This is what i was specting and im in love with my new pc is fantastic, has a big screen and is clear! I recomend this product to anybody!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love this Laptop
Reviews.Author: Carl C. Manion
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop. I bought it for my small business and am so glad I did. I works perfectly and is light-weight enough for my needs. I have not had any technical problems with it at all. It's just perfect.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Brian Z
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheap laptop that could basically just get Internet access and play music, that's exactly what it does. Working well enough so far.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: It`s a very good laptop, nice size, nice weight, everything about it is fine. So i highly recommended it. :)

Reviews.Title: Good for a basic laptop
Reviews.Author: J. Minner "Jacki Minner"
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop to return to college.  My first complaint is that while the keys are quite, they are hard to push.  You have to get used to the keyboard and the spacebar is horrible! I actually plug in a regular keyboard at my desk when I am writing for school.  It is too hard to type more than a couple of sentences on.Also, I have had it for under 6 months and now there is a line down the middle of the screen.  I tote it in a laptop backpack about once a week and I am the only one who has ever used it so I know there hasn't been any abuse so I don't understand the line.... I am kind of worried the whole screen will go out now.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: David Hughey
Reviews.Content: Very durable, versatile and easy to carry around.  It is just what I needed.  I have had no problems with this laptop.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: MelissaLynn88
Reviews.Content: The laptop is great! I just hate hate hate windows 8. I purchased this one used like new from warehouse deals and it arrived brand new. I only paid $300 for it and it serves its purpose. The windows 8 drives me insane however. I think I will give it to my kids and just buy me an apple laptop later.

Reviews.Title: Practically A New Unit
Reviews.Author: Hrailey
Reviews.Content: This computer came repackaged but the plastic was still around the computer (brown box) but functions and looks and acts as a new computer. I bought this unit for it's low power usage and I have not been disappointed. It runs for hours on end without a charge. It has Dell quality and is lightweight. It does what I need without any lagging problems. I don't game, but use for web and various utility programs. I have a research program that has a very large and expanding database and it functions fluidly and without any problem.

Reviews.Title: good laptop
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I've owned this for a year and had zero problems. good inexpensive laptop that has worked well for all my needs.

Reviews.Title: Affordable
Reviews.Author: East1997
Reviews.Content: I'm enjoying this Dell laptop and all of its features. I use for school as well as personal activities involving home.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Gwen Owens
Reviews.Content: I purchased this computer for my daughter for college it basically has not worked since we purchased it.  When I called Dell they basically said I could send it in to be repaired for a $259.00 or so because it is insure for a year but not for what they think is the problem.  REALLY I ended having an IT friend fix it and she went back to school and again not working now telling her she has no hard drive on a brand new computer.  Very annoying and Dell not the best to work with

Reviews.Title: We love it so much!
Reviews.Author: Geek T.
Reviews.Content: Its great and works well its fast and easy to use and it really does come in handy lots of times. great for kids in school.

Reviews.Title: Ok for a inexpensive laptop
Reviews.Author: ML
Reviews.Content: The laptop touch pad mouse clicks very loud so I would recommend an external mouse. The CPU is not always very responsive. There is a lot of lag when trying to move from one application to another. Overall this is a good purchase for someone who does not use a computer much but I would not purchase this as my work laptop or for someone who is a high functioning computer user.

Reviews.Title: THE SYSTEM JUST DIED BEYONG REMEDY
Reviews.Author: Joe Obiefuna
Reviews.Content: A ACQUIRED THIS SYSTEM ABOUT 6 MONTHS AGO. LAST WEEK, IT WENT BLANK AND REFUSED TO BOOT. ONLY BEEPS CONTINUALLY...9 BEEPS, THEN ANOTHER 7 BEEPS AN ON. I CHANGED THE RAM SINCE RETURN IS NOT LIKELY AN OPTION FOR ME. IT BOOTED. LATER THAT DAY, IT DIED AGAIN. IT IS A MOTHERBOARD PROBLEM. THE BOARD AND KEYBOARD ARE INSEPARABLE. PLEASE AVOID DELL LAPTOPS. THIS IS THE SECOND EXPERIENCE IN ONE YEAR.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: I bought this from the warehouse. Came with factory settings still set. I got to set it all up. Personalize it. No problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: love my dell but....
Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: i would have rated it 5 stars but when i called to get more information about the computer the woman couldnt tell me anything more than what was on the site...luckily for amazon i already had a dell inspiron n i loved it so i wanted newer updated version. so to Amazon u need to educate your sales personnel more about the products your selling

Reviews.Title: Purchased new but broken when arrived
Reviews.Author: CROOKS AT AMAZON
Reviews.Content: Purchased new and arrived in unworking condition.  Called dell and they had a tech on the job within two days.  Could not fix it properly and new unit was send by factory within a few days.  Would purchase products from Dell again.Properly impressed by Dell's handling of the issue.

Reviews.Title: great home laptop, one annoying fault
Reviews.Author: Gene Bowker "Rusted Rail Images"
Reviews.Content: I'm typing this on my Dell. I really like the laptop and have gotten used to Windows 8 finally.The only annoying thing (and what keeps it from getting a perfect 5 stars) is that when I touch the "base" of the keyboard on either side of the touch-pad it sometimes picks that up as a "click" and moves the cursor to that spot.When I'm typing on the attached keyboard, that can get to be annoying. It actually happened once during this review.Performance is great for the price and I think it is a good value for the price if you are looking for a "basic" laptop.

Reviews.Title: Decent basic computer
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my daughter for school. It's what I expected for a cheap laptop -- a bit clunky, not the fastest processor, etc. We bought this at the end of August and by mid-December, the adapter was no longer charging the computer's battery. Very frustrating but Dell's customer service was superb on this -- they shipped out a box for us to return it and repaired the whole thing, all within a span of less than two weeks (over the holidays). Bottom line: basic, no-frills computer but great customer service if something goes wrong while under warranty.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my 50 yrold dad
Reviews.Author: Diana Galan
Reviews.Content: Well, my dad is a teacher so basically the only things he does is search stuff on the web and read and send emails. Oh and presentations of course! So if your not an arquitech or an engineer youll find this laptop very useful for your purposes. Its been almost a year and its still intact, a good bargain i would say,

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Floris White Bull
Reviews.Content: I bought this from the warehouse. Came with factory settings still set. I got to set it all up. Personalize it. No problems with it at all. I would definitely buy from the warehouse again. Delivery was on time. Not one complaint!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Alice English
Reviews.Content: My main concern when buying this system was it having Windows 8, which I have always heard bad things about.  I got the computer and after the initial set-up, it took me about 5 minutes to get the hang of it. It is basically just a full screen start menu and you can switch between it and the desktop with ease.  There is an easy free update in the windows store to update to 8.1.  Pre-installed apps were easy to remove and all the programs I used on windows 7 seem to work flawlessly for windows 8.1.  Although I have only had the computer for a few day and have more to check out and work on, I get the impression that this is a decent product for the price and would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Laptop is a great Value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The laptop works fine.  The processor and hard drive is sufficient for the everyday needs.  The battery is great it last much longer than 4hrs on average. At times it last up to 6 hours doing browsing and using office. Still getting use to Windows 8, which is the greatest challenge.  The track pad is very responsive but it leaves a lot of permanent finger marks in very short order, shortly after staring to use it appeared as if it was being used for many months.  But this is a good buy based on the specs and price.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: francis a wilson
Reviews.Content: it's not a brand new lap top but works very well, i'm happy with it an would comceder buying an other at some time in futcher

Reviews.Title: budget laptop is real good deal
Reviews.Author: Judy Migliori
Reviews.Content: I was a little dubious about this computer but so far so good. I realize you get what you pay for but for the money I am happy. I do not like windows 8 operating system but it was easy to go back to windows 7 so I'm happy overall with this Dell.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop - just not a fan of windows 8
Reviews.Author: Steven West
Reviews.Content: The computer itself it GREAT, I am not a fan of the new windows program. Screen and Mouse are very sensitive to the touch. Gets frustrating when trying to move around.

Reviews.Title: In Love With my Inspirion 15
Reviews.Author: Janette Molina
Reviews.Content: In love with my laptop. Have to say that the windows is hard to overcome. Perfect size, Fast, Perfect for College. Battery Life is amazing (i can go without charging for a four days on 3-4 hours of use a day). Has a lot of ports which is good for me :D Shipping was also super fast and the whole thing was an amazing deal ESPECIALLY for the cost.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for my traveling teen
Reviews.Author: Felita Ramsami
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for my 18 year old to surf the web and complete his homework. Its light enought for him travel an hour and a half to and from school, and carry it around all day. The screen is a great size, we love the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: nice value for price
Reviews.Author: katnec
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time as promised and was packed very well.  The laptop was priced very nicely and my 16 year old is enjoying his first computer.

Reviews.Title: My new Dell
Reviews.Author: Michelle Battles
Reviews.Content: This new Dell is taking some getting used to. Windows 8 is cool but was confusing at first. I trust the Dell Brand so I'm happy with the product. One thing I would like to see changed is the uncomfortable edge on the computer wear your arms rest. I think it should be more rounded for added comfort. It feels almost like a countertop.

Reviews.Title: great price good product
Reviews.Author: Cheryl M
Reviews.Content: just the right weight. running like a gem no complaints whatsoever. i loved this sooooo much that i even ordered a second one for my sister. g

Reviews.Title: Stupid keyboard likes to crap out
Reviews.Author: Erick Shea
Reviews.Content: I actually purchased this at best buy for a black friday sale, it runs alright, its a low end laptop dont expect to run too much. My major beef is the keyboard. It appears that keys stick, because ill be working and suddenly the keyboard craps out and certain keys bring up shortcuts... the only way to fix is a restart, point is i will be getting my money back because i can't use a pc that requires restarting every 20 minutes just to get it to type, shoddily made keyboard, other than that its a decent computer.Make sure you get a warranty or replacement guarantee

Reviews.Title: It is what it is!
Reviews.Author: Libbysue5
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 is a challenge with out a touch screen.  Not disappointed with the Laptop, just wish it would have had Windows 7.

Reviews.Title: not worth the money
Reviews.Author: CHRIS ODIJK
Reviews.Content: Got for my brother and he really liked it until the installed software licenses started to expire. It's been 6 months and he has had several problems.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Clara Beard
Reviews.Content: This computer does everything we want it to do and expected it to do. The size makes it very useful and not cumbersome for  travel.

Reviews.Title: Not bad as a spare - after you get it working properly ...
Reviews.Author: kei. "g.k. bevido"
Reviews.Content: I had to spend $100.00, two visits by techs from a warranty I have that covers all computer related items, to have this cleaned up... and now it's finally working properly.  First - delivery of original order placed gets lost, I have to wait for second one to be shipped then notice I'm charged for two even though I have email saying credits were issued. But the reason for three stars is that it works now, after the tech had to practically rebuild it. Almost everything in my Control Panel was some type of "ware" if not a virus. For once though, I was glad to NOT see 50 google applications.  So once this is working properly, registers cleaned and do not install anything calling itself Microsoft Register CLeaning Pro because it is not really from Microsoft.  Meanwhile, you will get pop up warnings from the real Microsoft telling you there are registry issues ... and the CLeaning Pro pops open with a Windows type logo. This is a virus.  Many  of this type of "false pop-up scams or spam" happen, either claiming it's from Dell or Microsoft at the same time the real Dell or Microsoft is warning you something is not right. McAfee came installed for a 30 day trial, but after I put my own anti-virus and other protection their appeared to be far more than McAfee detected. I bought this NEW, after the horrible mistake of purchasing a refurbished computer  -- which is a whole other story. ANyway this Dell is okay, but slow and doesn't stream well. I don't hear any improvement in sound from Waves Maxx Audio (my old laptop had Beats Audio which produced a far better sound for whatever mode you put it in. Maybe Windows 8 is not for me ... after going through many, many Android devices - I needed a regular laptop and this Dell model sounded right for the price at the time I purchased it (a month ago).  This was a Prime purchase but came directly from Dell - or from Dell to AMazon - and it is not a bad computer for the price - just don't buy it for your main device. Most likely you'll find listening to music and streaming movies are better with devices you may have already. The fact that half the things in my computer after 2 weeks were found to be bad news - is the main reason I only gave it three stars. I'm not one to go randomly from site to site so I cannot understand the extra $100 I had to spend to get this to work properly - also, if it's speed you need - this is not the computer for you. Otherwise it is nice to have around when Android devices prohibit your access to many things.*UPDATE December 15, 2013: A/C adapter is junk. It's the kind that has a heavy transformer thing at an odd length and so heavy, it ends up pulling itself apart if plugged in while in use, which is not that often for me. One good feature this laptop has is its warning when battery is below 20% or if you leave A/C in too long. In other words, it helps you help ITs battery last longer ...I HOPE.  I had a hard time finding a replacement A/C charger/adapter at a decent price, too. I've owned this just over a month now- it required many, many updates and drivers and now the Cap-Lock key does the opposite of what it is there for. This happens right after 30 days .... unbelievable. I've had too many computer mishaps this year so I am satisfied with this thing as it is now but not thrilled. I'm not sure if my wifi/e-printer has a problemor if it's Windows 8 that doesn't allow a compatible update ... in any case that year old printer is now useless in conjunction with this laptop. I just GIVE UP.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Alka Dighe
Reviews.Content: It is very good for the purpose I bought it for, I play games on it only. It was cheaper too.

Reviews.Title: Good value for my money
Reviews.Author: Adrian Rios
Reviews.Content: Good value for the money I spent. It was a present for someone else but I played with it a little bit.

Reviews.Title: nothing but problems
Reviews.Author: dmc
Reviews.Content: I have had nothing but problems with this computer. Now it will not turn on and has a error message, I should have sent it back right away. It has not been 90 days and now it's hard to get it fixed. I am going to try and send it to Dell, Amazon only warranties it for 30 days. Not sure about other computers of this model but this one is garbage.

Reviews.Title: you get what exactly what you pay for
Reviews.Author: nicko post
Reviews.Content: the quality is ok, the screen resolution is not the best and it took me a while for my eyes to get accustom to it

Reviews.Title: Great computer for the price
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Pechacek
Reviews.Content: Perfect for school and entertainment needs.  No real problems with windows 8, just a little getting used to and I am intuitively getting it.

Reviews.Title: Got it for the kids...works great for them
Reviews.Author: Laidefair
Reviews.Content: Wanted a computer for the kids.  Have had not problems with them.  Of course the kids are telling me how to run Windows8.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Product
Reviews.Author: Randy Cervantes
Reviews.Content: I agree that it is a quality product 100% recommended for necessities. student's request for reasons and has been fantast.

Reviews.Title: excellnet
Reviews.Author: tere
Reviews.Content: excellent computer, dell is very very good factory of computer, very nice design and very interesting operative system, i recommend it, excellent for basic tasks

Reviews.Title: A good laptop
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey Sullivan
Reviews.Content: My only issue with the laptop is the way the battery charging profiles inherent in the software are set up, other than that-this is a great laptop.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: emily
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this product. Delivery was fast and the laptop is perfect for basic needs and fast. It's great for studying :)

Reviews.Title: Great Budget Laptop
Reviews.Author: One Owl
Reviews.Content: Awesome buy. Super Budget Laptop but I hate Windows 8. LOL. But not worried, I can install a version of windows 7 and dual boot.

Reviews.Title: Next to impossible to use
Reviews.Author: jude
Reviews.Content: This computer is so off the realm of understanding for the average user.  I've tried to have the Office 30 day FREE trial installed by going through the process with the foreigh Dell Customer Service's reps twice.  The first time the rep assured me it was installed and it wasn't; the second rep said he was uninstalling Office 2010 and reinstalling 2013 and when that didn't work he told me I was no longer entitled to the FREE trial.Logging on takes up to 4 minutes to (warm up).  Accessing the internet allows only 1 selection.  There are numerous other issues that I can't even explain but after 3-4 weeks of usage all I can do is access my email and only sometimes access the internet via Bing.  I even purchased the Windows 8 for Dummies.I'D REALLY LIKE TO RETURN THIS PRODUCT!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jerry D Anderson
Reviews.Content: The only thing I don't like is windows 8 is so hard to use.  I like my PC with XP.

Reviews.Title: DELL LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: cheli
Reviews.Content: I FOUND THE DELL INSPIRION LAPTOP TO BE EVERYTHING I WANTED. SOFTWARE FRIENDLY. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. I HAVE BEEN USING IT EVERYDAY!

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 really stinks
Reviews.Author: Collie
Reviews.Content: The computer is fine, Windows 8 stinks!!  I don't have anything else to say.  Wow, this is really super riduculous

Reviews.Title: Greate latop.
Reviews.Author: Gil
Reviews.Content: It's light .Nice price. The system work great .nice color and perfect.For my needs it rely what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Does what I need it to do.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Miller
Reviews.Content: I just received the laptop today and I have not yet had any problems with it. The touchpad is a bit sensitive and I need to get used to using Windows 8, but other than that there have been no major problems with setup or use. The battery lasts for 5-6 hours without needing to be recharged and the computer is easy to setup.

Reviews.Title: My new laptop
Reviews.Author: shirl
Reviews.Content: My  computer arrived on time and I just love it.  At first it was difficult adjusting from a desktop to a laptop, but now I wouldn't trade it for anything.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Rice
Reviews.Content: This product meet all the specs as stated and is excellent for someone studying. I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: windows 8 reeks
Reviews.Author: taxt
Reviews.Content: I've got no complaints about the laptop itself, but Windows 8 is the absolute worst yet, and I've used all those that came before.  It's like they removed everything that made the prior versions convenient and rearranged everything that was left to make it as inconvenient and convoluted as possible.  I'm not blaming Dell.  They're head and shoulders above the Toshiba piece of junk I got last time (never again), but Windows 8 has really spoiled the fun of having a new laptop, never mind trying to get any work done on it.

Reviews.Title: Nice budget laptop
Reviews.Author: 4 Kids 2 Exhausted
Reviews.Content: This laptop has solid construction and decent performance. I got a refurbished one via warehouse deals, and installed Ubuntu 13.04 on it for my wife to use. By the way, 12.04 had some driver compatibility issues. They might be fixed in updates, but I just went ahead and installed 13.04 instead and it works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Works great as long as it's working at all
Reviews.Author: Kyle Loree
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop as a little present to myself for getting a job and because I desperately needed an upgrade from the dinosaur I used to use. The one I got was used by the way. After having to pick the computer up myself because USPS decided they didn't want to actually do their jobs and deliver it to me, I then got to get used to Windows 8, which was a JOY (not).The way I got it, the touchpad didn't work, just as I was told in the description on the used page, but I just used my wireless mouse and called it good. And it was VERY good... for about 2 weeks. Then, yesterday, the screen went blank all of a sudden and would not turn back on, after rebooting, troubleshooting, and everything else I know how to do. The screen just died. I was just doing my regular computer things and then POOF! Dead.Although my particular case was a big disappointment, it was actually a REALLY good laptop... until it broke that is. I would totally recommend it, but just know that if you buy this laptop, it may spontaneously decide to stop working.

Reviews.Title: Price is worth it
Reviews.Author: Stacy Nguyen
Reviews.Content: This laptop works just like any laptop. It is good for you if you're a college student. If you're a heavy user this is not for you

Reviews.Title: Widows 8 is hard to get used to.
Reviews.Author: cynthia stone
Reviews.Content: I am not computer savvy, so windows 8 is confusing. The computer itself is fast. I enjoy web surfing and once I get used to windows 8, there will be no problems!

Reviews.Title: Strongly recommand it
Reviews.Author: Saieb AlRawi
Reviews.Content: The computer met and exceeded my expectations for that price.Light weight and compact, easy to use, definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer Even Better Price
Reviews.Author: Joshua Hare
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer for the average college or high school student. Its processor is very capable of handling basic tasks like checking email or watching movies etc. The island style keyboard is a plus for a computer of this price. The number pad is a huge bonus along with the two USB 3.0 ports. The sound system is also very nice for an economical laptop. This is NOT a gaming computer but it will do for your everyday computer needs. I wish it had a VGA port but I can live without it. It is also a plus that a computer as thin as this one still has an optical drive. I docked it 1 star since the laptop design itself is susceptible(although not to the degree that a glossy finish would be)  to finger prints. The charging port is tough to insert and remove. All in all I'm going to finish my bachelors degree with this computer and I would recommend it to anyone with basic computing needs as it's the best computer in its price range.

Reviews.Title: Simple work pc
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Sankey
Reviews.Content: works great for my work, easy to care it with my new case, it's my 1st pc with Windows 8 and I enjoy it, I thing it was worth to buy

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jumbo
Reviews.Content: The screen and the sound system are very good.  Overall I am very happy with it for less than $350.  However, the two majors cons are memory and the mouse buttons.  The memory seemed great to me, but Windows 8 needs a lot.  Also, the mouse buttons just have a cheap feel when you use them.

Reviews.Title: Price, size, functionality
Reviews.Author: Nadia Escamilla
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a regular laptop, this will fit you perfectly, slim, numeric keyboard, intel processor, 15'', it's light and worth every peny.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for the Price
Reviews.Author: Laura Rougeau
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop back in May 2013 and finally upgraded the BIOS thanks to the review from D. Young on May 11th.  The fan was very noisy but after upgrading the BIOS per phone call with DELL, the fan is silent.  I should have gotten around to it sooner!!!!  I would suggest doing it right away if you purchase and have this problem because it took some time to back-up music, favorites, pictures, etc. before upgrading the BIOS.  They are up to BIOS A09 now. The phone rep from DELL that assisted was wonderful with helping.  The only other Con I found with this product is that the left and right keyboard selections are a little clicky and noisy and the trim on the edge of the laptop keyboard is a little sharp when you rest your wrists on it but for the price I can deal with it.The performance is good so far and it does take a little adjustment to get used to Windows 8 but there is instruction on the desktop.  This laptop has everything I needed including a CD/DVD player.I purchased at Best Buy in a bundle special which also included Webroot internet security, a wireless mouse and laptop sleeve for $349.99.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron !% i!%RV-6190BLK 15.6" Laptop
Reviews.Author: BillsTake
Reviews.Content: This laptop comes with a 1.8GHz Pentium CPU, 500GB HD, 4GB RAM. It does NOT have a touch screen which is not needed because it has a touch pad with left and right keys (same function as mouse left-right keys) and 4 USB connections (3 USB3, 1 USB2) to connect a mouse. It also has WiFi, Battery, AC to DC power cord/charger and pre-loaded Windows 8. This laptop is a good system for home because of the $299 ($325 total) price and Dell support. Windows 8 has both picture control screens as well as folder/file name screens and backward compatible capability for programs that run on Windows XP. It is frustrating to learn Windows 8 but there is a great tutorial application that will help you learn.

Reviews.Title: Window 8
Reviews.Author: Dee Jay
Reviews.Content: Good laptop. It is larger than I expected. There is a learning curve when trying to use Windows 8.  Still in the learning phase.  I recommend it but I wish I would not have to learn the new Windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: James Werth
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop so far, but I don't like the fact that it only comes with Windows 8 Operating System.  My wife and I hate Windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Very nice laptop...
Reviews.Author: Alan R. Mercurio
Reviews.Content: My company recently updated myself and a few others with this model laptop and I was so impressed with it I purchased this from Amazon for myself at home.

Reviews.Title: I love my Inspiron 15!!!
Reviews.Author: C. Mulrooney "ceye"
Reviews.Content: This item features Windows 8. I have heard it said that Windows 8 is either LOVED or HATED.  So far I love it. It is sort of intuitive and so far I am surprised when the program does something ahead of me--I LIKE it. When I type a line for the net (www.---) POOF! the site appears w/o me clicking any other tab. Fun!  It scrolls left to right and it is easy to learn to operate with the Windows learn Videos. They go a little fast!!, but you are able to stop the lesson and practice what is being played. Moving around this program is very different but once you get the Idea of sliding and dropping at the bottom of the screen...it's sooooo (COOL-ok I'm an oldie but a goodie) it feels so smooth to do the regular  daily tasks with new smooth motions. It does feel like I've gone from mashing at my computer to sliding all around.  But, definitely, USE A MOUSE !! Quicker, smoother. Have Fun.  This computer has a LARGE screen which I appreciate when playing "Hidden Objects". The larger Laptop keyboard is just the right size. Now when I type in letters, I don't accidently get the one next store!!! (--I instead of o) because I type fast!  So far, so good. More updates later.  Try it!(Shortly after I wrote this, I upgraded to Windows8.1 A Good Idea!)

Reviews.Title: Useful laptop
Reviews.Author: ludwig2013
Reviews.Content: The laptop was delivered in time and really helpful for my study and entertainment. I can use it to surf the web, read the literature and chat with my friends and parents.

Reviews.Title: Great quality Laptop
Reviews.Author: Linda Derango "fashiongirl"
Reviews.Content: It has a superior quality picture screen. Computer is fast and easy to use. Very slim. compact and lightweight. Would highly recommend for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: nice computer
Reviews.Author: Edin Denis Hernandez "Denis Hernandez"
Reviews.Content: great seller, nice computer,,, according my spectactions i am happy because was for re sell, the price i paid was according i was looking for,,

Reviews.Title: It works well. I would recommend it to friend if they had a son or a son or daughter  going back to school.
Reviews.Author: Bobby L. Crawford
Reviews.Content: It works well. I would recommend it to friend if they had a son or a son or daughter  going back to school.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: M. Harrington
Reviews.Content: I wasn't thrilled with the Windows 8 at first but now I love it. I use this computer for my real estate business as well as personal. It fits the bill.  Definitely worth it for the inexpensive price.

Reviews.Title: Dell Laptop
Reviews.Author: Caridad
Reviews.Content: I will write a short pros vs. cons list of the laptop.Cons:1 Keyboard: The keyboard, including the space bar, need to be typed on firmly. For instance, I was typing withoutlooking at the screen, and when I looked up, there were no spaces between the words.2 Hot: I may need to adjust the settings, but the bottom of the laptop is hot to the touchwithout a cooling pad.3 No backlight on keyboard: The keys do not light up at night or when it's dark.4 455 GB not 500 GB as advertised: It's not a deal breaker for me, but only 455 GBof free space instead of 500 GB.5 Opening laptop; BE CAREFUL: A reviewer mentioned this and I should have followed his advice. I opened the laptopwith one hand and the bottom of the laptop roughly hit the table and it almost fell. Please open thelaptop with 2 hands. With one hand, slowly open the top part of it and with the other hand firmlyhold the bottom part down.6 No free games installed: There are no free games installed, but you can download free gamesfrom the Windows 8 store.[...]Pros:1 Cheap! I only paid $300.2 Lightweight and thin3 Durable: I accidentally banged it against the table and nothing bad happened to it. I don't knowif that would be the case if it landed on the floor; but the outer shell seems durable and hard andnot light and flimsy4 Keys are easy to clean: There is a enough space between the keys to easily clean with acotton swab.5 Wireless Bluetooth connection: You can connect bluetooth devices to the laptop. For instance,I wirelessly connected my phone to the laptop, and was able to send pictures, music, and videosfrom my computer to the phone and from my phone to the computer without using a USB cord. Also,you can use your phone like a remote control.  Just click on the song you want to play from yourphone and it will play on your computer, even if your computer is in another room! On the desktopon the right side of the bottom task bar, click on the arrow (next to the flag icon) and selecta round blue icon and then select add devices, then it will locate your device and your good togo.6 Fast and reliable: I have no issue with speed if I have multiple programs open,am downloading music or movies, or watching movies or videos on the computer or webbrowsing. You can do multiple things at once, without a problem. But for gamers, probably not,but for the "average user" I'm sure it will  be fine.In short, it's a good laptop for someone who does not need a high speed processor, a state of theart web cam, camera, high resolution screen, or a ton of memory or RAM.

Reviews.Title: Annoying but functional
Reviews.Author: Bridget W
Reviews.Content: This laptop seems like a great buy for the price. I've had it for about 2 months now, and nothing is wrong with it. I gave it 3 stars because when I use the scroll bar on the right side of the screen and then move my mouse away from it, 2 in 3 times it will open a menu. (There is no setting to prevent this particular menu from coming up like that.) Then I simply have to click anywhere on the screen (not on the menu) and the menu disappears. It's super annoying, but I'm used to it by now. At least it's much less annoying than my previous computer...There are other little annoying things, like needing to go to My Computer on the desktop instead of the "Settings" item on the aforementioned menu to change pretty much everything. But otherwise, it's a well-functioning computer.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: TE
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop for the money. I was looking for a reliable machine to do online work and word processing and it does everything I need in that respect. The finish is really cool. Price was also a big factor for me and this laptop won hands down! The only reason I went with 4 instead of 5 stars was that it came with the awful Windows 8 installed. Actually I guess there wasn't much choice for Dell, but I would have preferred Windows 7.

Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop for the given price
Reviews.Author: Vikrant B Thakre
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a decent laptop for home and entertaintment use.This laptop meets all the basic requirements. It did have an issue though with the screen when I opened it from the box and ran the initial configuration. I had to call up the Dell Helpdesk and they did resolve it immediately by sending a technician to my house.After that I haven't seen any issues with this laptop and it has functioned well to its expectations,I would recommend this product for the users who are looking for a decent good performance home entertaintment and personal use.

Reviews.Title: good prıce good computer ...
Reviews.Author: dursun ali
Reviews.Content: ıt has been 2 weeks ısnce ı purchased this laptop and ı can say that this computer is completely what ı look for and and ıt does not heat at all ans ı have not have had any problem so far

Reviews.Title: Great Value--Windows 8, however, is a disappointment.
Reviews.Author: Douglas Smith
Reviews.Content: Overall I like the product.  Great value for the money.  A little disappointed with the operating system--Windows 8.  I find that it annoyingly restarts to install updates while I'm in the middle of doing work despite my commands otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Really great laptop at a solid value price
Reviews.Author: cowqlator
Reviews.Content: I studied out the various options and bought this unit a few weeks ago.  It was easy to setup and working with Windows 8 has been Ok so far.  I was able to reload a licensed version of Student Office which was lost when my last laptop crashed.  It loaded and runs just fine.  Dell has always been solid and this looks like another great product.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: mzbossy
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop to take on-line courses and I'm hoping that it meets my expectations. Had a few problems and was able to call right away and speak with someone who provided execellent service.

Reviews.Title: Can't ask for more - Great product  Great price
Reviews.Author: Jawad Anwar
Reviews.Content: I had no issues so far, everything is working great.though I must say, would have been better if it had a RGB Pin Output for my monitor.It has HDMI and USBs only but I guess thats ok as it makes it quite slim.the keyboard panel is very good compare to my last Inspiron experience which use to come out often.Windows 8 is working great.. Overall great deal

Reviews.Title: Great little puter.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer G. Mills
Reviews.Content: Window 8 is fantastic! After using Vista, I am thrilled to have this new system. Fast, user friendly, and stylish.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: LeAnne Blakeman
Reviews.Content: easy to utilize, Have had two Dell computers and they are above Compaq and Google Chrome and several other computers I have used!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: T. Peters

Reviews.Content: This is my second laptop from Dell I have owned and once I received it I played around with it and now I like it.

My cousin has 2 teenagers in High School that are already using this and my cousin will start soon too he just needs a updated computer class he,he,he... This computer is just right for what these 2 family needs plus the price is just awesome.  I will come back for a 3rd one as soon as my own computer decides to kick the bucket.  Thanks so far so good & this was the 1st time I ever bought a laptop from the Internet I'm very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Francisco Escribá
Reviews.Content: This Laptop has an excellent configuration, price and quality.One feature very important is the low heat this laptop produce.The keyboard very confortable and with separate numkeys very usefulYou recieved a huge amount of features for the price paidThe only con I found is the lack of vga connectionAll the other connections are just fine, but for a presentation and attach a monitor or projector, its a problem.Francisco Escribá

Reviews.Title: Upgraded to OK, Downgraded to poor
Reviews.Author: Donald W. Wall
Reviews.Content: I'm using the computer right now to write this review. To get the cursor to move I have to HAMMER on the touch pad. The WiFi works sporadically. Although it indicates 5 bars pages either load or generate a "page not available" message randomly. Not available? Crap, that just means the computer's Wifi isn't working. My previous HP 2 year old laptop had a better touchpad and WiFi. Shouldn't things get better in 2 years?Further, this computer has Windows 8. More crap. Large scale arbitrary changes without any benefit. It will take me hours to learn to do things I used to do easily on XP or Win 7. Why does Microsoft keep screwing with things? Haven't they heard, "If it isn't broke, don't fix it"?P.S. I'm on my 3rd try to get this review to get thru the wifi connection.EDIT: With phone help after 45 minutes they were able to make the WiFi work properly. Now I have a solid connection. Thank you DELL.EDIT 2: Let down again. Today for the first time I tried to rip some audio CDs using the onboard CD/DVD player. Of 5 discs it read 2 ok, but several tracks on 3 of them wouldn't read. I took those 3 CDs to a portable CD player on another computer , Delland they read and ripped without problem. Screwed again, Dell! FURTHER: This Windows 8 (I hesitate to capitalize it. Too respectful.) is pure crap. Arbitrary changes with no benefit. As I'm using the touch pad the flippin' popups keep intruding on what I'm doing. I only want it to do so one in ten times that it happens. Microsoft, STOP IT!!!! Did you not user test this at all??? Whose dopey idea was this? Windows 7 was annoying enough. Let's go back to the XP interface that worked just fine. No wonder Google is embarrassing Microsoft. Microsoft has lost touch.

Reviews.Title: Amazing what you get for the money these days
Reviews.Author: AWGamer11
Reviews.Content: - Dell name brand 15" laptop at a bargain price- Windows 8, it's new, but once I spent some time with the machine I felt comfortable with it.- Enough processing power and storage for most people. Read the specs, but has most options you would want in a basic laptop.- Display was better than I thought. I'm used to a Macbook Pro which is much more expensive, and this screen didn't disappoint me.- onboard CD drive is becoming less and less common, glad this one HAS it!- USB ports, etc. All you should need in a basic computer.- Days of spending 1000-1200 for a basic laptop are long gone. This is a solid package at a GREAT price! Is it a HIGH end laptop?NO! but if you read the specs and it fits what you need, look no further.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: camille miller
Reviews.Content: It's really a nice computer as are all Dell's products not dissapointed so far and I really loved the outside texture. what I really treasure though is the fact that it has no problem logging on to the internet on the sound is awesome would recommend if you are looking for something for school.

Reviews.Title: perfect for home & school
Reviews.Author: D'stress
Reviews.Content: great price, excellent dell support, does everything I could possibly need.  I have learned the expensive way not to over buy especially computers

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price, runs Windows 7 like a charm, EXCELLENT sound for a laptop
Reviews.Author: Imho
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with this budget laptop. For the price, I could not find anything that could touch it. The compromises Dell made were the right ones. I needed to buy a budget laptop for a limited purpose for the least amount of money, and I zeroed in on this Dell due to features.The highlights:OS - It came with Windows 8 which is an abomination on a non touchscreen device, and just plain sucks on any device. I would not use the word struggle. I don't "struggle" with any computer device after having done this since there WERE computer devices to begin with. But, even though I could accomplish what I needed, I hated Win 8, form AND function. I began to dislike the computer because of the OS. But that is a subject for another review. So I put Windows 7 on this laptop. Installation was painless, drivers are all available on Dell website, and the machine purrs happily now, and I do not hate it anymore.Speed - it is fast for any business and everyday task.Sound and multimedia - Dell has gotten it right! The speakers sound awesome for a laptop. There are physical limitations to what you can do with such tiny speakers, and they pushed the current tech to its limit. The sound quality AND the volume are VERY good, again, for a laptop.I can contrast it to another budget laptop (Toshiba) that a family member uses. The Toshiba is a nice laptop, comparable to this Dell in every way, but the speakers are terrible and NOT loud enough to be usable. I would not recommend that Toshiba because of it, the Dell is so much better. I have used very expensive laptops, and the sound from this Dell is on par, if not better. I find that when I play music and don't want to use headphones, I turn to the Dell more often than my tablet.Build quality - fine for the price. This is NOT a beater. It is thin and probably fragile as is anything in this price range. No worse than anything else under $600. The matte textured finish is prone to collecting fingerprints, body oils and dirt, but cleans easily.So that's about it. I recommend this machine highly in combination with Windows 7 only.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Mix
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: The battery life is excellent , the sound is spectacular everything about this dell is pretty great worth the price for sure

Reviews.Title: 15.6" laptop dell inspiron
Reviews.Author: Jenneth Prince
Reviews.Content: The dell inspiron is easy to use.I've had a dell for about 6 years.  Don't like windows 8, not user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Don't hold Windows 8 against it.
Reviews.Author: Jason B "Indeed"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something fairly inexpensive to use for some basic home audio recording & video editing.  The dimensions and specs on this seemed good for the price.  I received it and booted to Windows 8.  Wow.  That is a horrific thing to do to a laptop.  I can see how it would work on a tablet, but after about 45 minutes of playing around I was fed up.  So I wiped it and installed Linux Mint KDE 14 on it.  Beautiful install, fantastic experience.  All the hardware detected well, and everything works great.  I've been using it heavily for about a month now with no issues.The device does feel light, but it also feels pretty well made.  Battery life seems to be about 5 hours with decent usage when off of AC power.  So Windows 8 is atrocious, but the laptop is not.  Load Linux, Windows 7, or even DOS and you'll be happy.

Reviews.Title: for my husband
Reviews.Author: Paula Penzien
Reviews.Content: My husband's computer was so slow it was time for an upgrade here it was he is really enjoying it

Reviews.Title: Excelent!!
Reviews.Author: José Angel Martínez García
Reviews.Content: Thanks, I'm very happy with the product.... Dell computers are elegant, with excellent performance, are faster and beautiful.. 100 % recommended... :)

Reviews.Title: too tinny
Reviews.Author: lou donna stewart
Reviews.Content: I don't mean small, I mean it sounds really cheap. Some of the keys sound like tin on tin. I have had Dell computers in the past and have had no problems.  But this one I didn't like

Reviews.Title: A few problems, but I still like the laptop.
Reviews.Author: James Walker
Reviews.Content: Overall, the laptop works fine. I don't have any major complaints, just a couple of minor ones.1) Sometimes when I'm typing, my thumb accidentally taps the touchpad, which moves the mouse and causes me to screw up my sentences.2) I don't like Windows 8. I wish it had Windows 7. The start screen instead of a start button is annoying. It just adds an extra step for typical tasks like shutting down the computer or accessing the desktop.3) The textured surface isn't attractive.4) It has an HDMI output, which is nice, but I wish there was also a VGA output.That's all. Nothing terrible.

Reviews.Title: Key Board sticks
Reviews.Author: Angela Joyner
Reviews.Content: I hate it.  I received it in the mail today and it is awful.  The space bar sticks.  In regards to Windows 8, it is also not very user friendly to set up.  I would not call myself a computer genius but I know my way around computers and this is confusing and terrible.  If the keyboard did not stick I would wait it out and figure out how to use the system but I can't even put something in google to research without getting so frustrated that I want to pull my hair out because of the stupid keyboard.  Terrible product.

Reviews.Title: This Dell laptop has Windows 8, which has been a steep learning curve for me.
Reviews.Author: Nonnie AD "rapt reader"
Reviews.Content: I am not a tech savvy person so I wanted something easy to understand.  I researched several laptops for customer satisfaction and decided on this Dell Inspiron due to the number of 5 and 4 star ratings AND the low sale price.  At the end of my first month I am very satisfied with the Wi-Fi and ease of use although the Windows 8 is not what I was used to.  I am getting accustomed to it even tho originally I had thought to use the RetroUI site to reconfigure to Windows 7 style.  There was a cautionary note not to do so" if...".  I couldn't tell if the "if" statement applied to this computer so decided to accustom myself to Windows 8.  I am 72 and have a steep learning curve on computer stuff but so far, so good.  My daughter who is an Information Tech on a help desk told me I should get a copy of Windows 8 for Dummies.  So far I have not done so but I do miss the short cuts I knew with Windows 7.  That Dummies book may be my next purchase ;-)

Reviews.Title: it just fit my desire i would have any more in the near future

Reviews.Content: this product is much more i have expected,as far as my knowledge this pc meets my desire very well.i will refer this product to myrelatives and friends.

Up until the past few months this Dell Laptop has been Lagging in performance, This Dell takes a very long time to turn on, there is at least a 2-5 sec mouse click delay.... not cool!! I'm not sure what's going on with this dell but I don't like it!!! I spent over $300 on this dell and expect their product to perform as intended.. yet I get the runaround from customer care.... not willing to help, such a waste of time... I strongly suggest purchasing another Laptop.. this dell was a waste of my hard earned money!

Reviews.Title: Excellent, solid machine for the price.
Reviews.Author: John A. LoGiudice "Diggerjohn O' the North"
Reviews.Content: The Dell Inspiron 15 i15RV-----etc. is considered a budget machine, but it preforms like a top of the line laptop that would normally be three times the price. The computer is very fast, has a friendly user interface (in spite of Windows 8), and heat is not an issue at all with this machine. I have seen recommendations for this computer "for people on a budget", it is actually better than many of the top of the line machines. For those of you into the looks of a machine; the sleek,black finish on this machine is smart and minimal, it is also quite light weight for its size, with a pleasantly thin profile. This is a very professional looking, and preforming machine.

I use this computer to communicate with family and friends via email, Skype and other social media. Only downside so far that I can tell is that it comes stocked with Windows 8, and since it's not a touch screen laptop, I'm not a fan of W8. I guess it's just preference, but for now still like W7 much better. The laptop is fairly quick with opening apps and performs with ease when multiple windows are open.

Reviews.Title: The machine is fine, Windows 8 is HORRIBLE

The computer freezes,  the mouse pad stops working for 3-5 mins at random times,  slow for surfing the internet.  I'm not a fan of the windows 8 but that I can handle if the laptop worked right.  Such a disappointment.The only positive things I can come up with are superficial.  Its a nice looking laptop,  it cleans very easily and its very light weight for carrying to and from work.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspirion purchase order

Reviews.Title: don't like
Reviews.Author: fabyse

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Content: The laptop is good, but it's too big for a girl~~Good for watching movie on the laptop.like it

Reviews.Title: Down with Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Travis
Reviews.Content: As long as Dell only uses Window 8 I will never buy another product from their company although this was the third Dell I have purchased. I have 3 computers, 2 Kindles and an i pad. Windows 8 is the most consumer unfriendly product I have ever used.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD FOR ANYTHING FUN
Reviews.Author: Shaipo
Reviews.Content: I HATE THIS COMPUTER!!! It came installed with Windows 8. Windows 8 is the most terrifying thing for your computer! It's so bad!!! I'm used to a Mac but I wanted to play certain games that are only available for PC. I'd play The Sims on my Mac but Create a World is only for PCs. I COULDN'T EVEN PLAY THE SIMS 3 ON THIS PC. Why? Because the graphics suck! The only color graphics it has is, like, sRGB IEC61966-2.1 which SUCKS AND IS FROM, LIKE, THE 90S... I'm used to "Color LCD" on my Mac. I was so confused about the graphics on this computer, though. The start screen's colors had depth and were fine but on everything else it sucked. So it makes me think there's a way to change it. BUT HOW?!?!?!? I would never know because they have no guide to tell you. I of course even Googled everything I could, but with NO LUCK. Since I have no apparent use for this computer anymore because it's not functional whatsoever to me, I was going to give the computer to my 57 year old mom as her first computer. She wants it, but I'd feel so guilty for her because if I can't figure out a way around this terrible Windows 8, how will she?

Reviews.Title: Defective Laptop !!!
Reviews.Author: Tanvir Ahmed Khan
Reviews.Content: I have ordered this Laptop three days ago and it delivered yesterday before the schedule. I was so pleased when I received it. But my pleasure soon turned into nightmare when I Pressed the Power Button after connecting it with its charger. The Laptop didn't Start up at all. I have then called Dell Technical Support. With their instruction I've tried to open it in every way it's possible to open the laptop. Finally, they said they will send a Technician at my home with the parts to fix the Laptop. But I wonder didn't they perform quality control test before they put it on for sell?? Now they might could fix it for now because I have 1 year warranty.  But I'm afraid if another defect shows up, what I'll do then?? This is first time I felt cheated and very very disappointed with an Amazon purchase.

Reviews.Title: 2nd problem with a "NEW" DELL laptop
Reviews.Author: Dennis Mundy
Reviews.Content: This one has an intermittent 'card reader', I bought this ONLY as a backup for the other DELL laptop which I had to return , due to a bad 'hard-drive'.  We have had much luck with DELL so far.  In the past 20 +years have had mostly HP',s & also some  ACER's which have been fine, just normal problems.  Probably will not buy any more DELL's.

Reviews.Title: Computer okay but comes with Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Kathryh Hoelzel
Reviews.Content: If you have read reviews, you will see that Windows 8 works best on touch screens.  The computer itself is fine, but it is taking some time to get used to (had Vista prior)

Reviews.Title: A Very Good Choice.
Reviews.Author: R. L. Kumpf
Reviews.Content: Hello.I purchased the Dell Inspiron.  My HP tower died.  I needed a new computer.  I was dreading the software these manufactures install.  I don't think HP was actually running genuine Windows.  I was kind of glad it gave up on me.  But,  I'm in the digital media market.  I need to stay online for business.  I'll try the Dell.  I fired up my new Dell notebook.  I'm not having any problems.  It came with a Kindle app for Windows 8.  My Kindle cloud appeared in one click.  No need to download anything from Amazon.  This quality reader took care of everything.  I tried to install my old copy of Windows 8 Pro.  It said the activation key was valid.  Windows wasn't activated.  They said I needed to purchase a new copy, after all.  Trouble!  Not much...  Dell saw to it to have automatic restore points for adding features to Windows enabled.  I was back into the original Windows 8 installation the manufacturer installed.  I would suggest Windows 8 Pro with Media Center.  I'm now running the new copy I bought from Amazon on my Dell notebook.  The Dell Inspiron is probably one of the better computers on the market today!Have some fun!Sincerely,Robert Lee Kumpf

Reviews.Title: Weird Laptop
Reviews.Author: MommyOfFourLasVegas
Reviews.Content: Mousepad is weird. It doesn't move like it should. It's very slow and hard to get mouse to desired destination. Must return because it's so bad.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Toshiba laptop to fail in 1 year.  T
Reviews.Author: Shirley Cook
Reviews.Content: The laptop no longer powers up and itis only 5 months old.  This is the second one to fail that was less than 1 year old.  Poor quality.

Reviews.Title: Just awful
Reviews.Author: EP
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop thinking I would enjoy Windows 8 ... Windows 8 sucks. The mail app is worthless, the Bing app is worthless, I could go on and on here. The "charms" aren't very charming.Aside from the horrible OS, the laptop is cheaply made junk. The disk drive is completely plastic with next to no support. The one I got wouldn't even work properly, it made a lot of loud clicking noises. I am sending this product back. After that I will buy a new laptop with Windows 7, but I don't know that it will be from Amazon. I think a laptop is something best purchased where you can try it out before making completing the transaction.

Reviews.Title: Computer is ok, but Windows 8 is horrible
Reviews.Author: Biju
Reviews.Content: I have to say Windows 8 is horrible, what were they thinking when they designed it.  I am fairly proficient in using a computer and with this Windows 8 the computer seems so horrible.  I wish there was a way to downgrade to windows 7.  Get a Mac don't get this crap.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 Is Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Cristy
Reviews.Content: I hate windows 8 and I'm returning my laptop. I like the laptop but will never purchase anything with windows 8 I don't know what microsoft was thinking when the designed windows 8!

Reviews.Title: laptop

Reviews.Content: I received it but the fan is too loud to study with. I really wish i knew that before buying it. Cant even go with it to class. Waste of money.

Reviews.Content: Worst laptop in the world, never seen something like this, save your money and buy a Mac book or even an acer
